trans-unit.source: Renders the document outline for the workflow currently being designed in the workflow designer.
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline> displays a hierarchical representation of the workflow in the workflow designer.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline"></xref> class by using an object that retrieves a service object.
The <xref href="System.IServiceProvider"></xref> that retrieves a service object for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline"></xref>.
serviceProvider contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
The hosting environment obtained through serviceProvider is null (`Nothing`).
\- or -
The design surface obtained through serviceProvider is null (`Nothing`).
Creates a new node for an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
Calls to create a new workflow node for a given activity could return `null`, which indicates that you do not want to create a node for it.
Activity for which a new node must be created.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutlineNode"></xref> for the activity.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
`true` to release both managed and unmanaged resources; `false` to release only unmanaged resources.
Event raised when the TreeView for the document outline is expanding.
Retrieves the node in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline"></xref> associated with the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.

A <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline> contains one <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutlineNode> for each activity a user adds to a workflow design surface.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> associated with the node to retrieve.
The that is associated with activity.
Returns an object that represents a service provided by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline"></xref> or by its <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Container"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that represents the service provided by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents a service provided by <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the document outline TreeView needs to be expanded.
`true` if the document outline TreeView needs to be expanded; otherwise, `false`.
Called when the control is starting to update the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline.TreeView"></xref>.
Called when the control is finished updating the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline.TreeView"></xref>.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load"></xref> event.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline.OnLoad%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

When overriding <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline.OnLoad%2A> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's `OnLoad` method so that registered delegates receive the event.
An <xref href="System.EventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Called after a new node that is not null is added to the activity tree.
Node that was added to the activity tree.
Called when the user selects a node in the activity tree.
Node that was selected.
Called when the node is refreshed.
Workflow outline node that was refreshed.
Forces a node to be refreshed.
Node that must be updated.
`Boolean` value that indicates whether child nodes must be updated.
Refreshes color and icons of all document outline nodes.
Reloads the document outline control.
Gets the root node of the root provider.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> that is the root node.
Retrieves the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control used to display the document outline
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control used to display the document outline.
